overview: A white void; gloved hands reach out and pull. A woman's face clenched with pain. No dialogue save for screams and panting. The gloved hands pull a painting out of Natasha. Her pain subsides, and she cradles the painting in her arms. In the hospital, there are hundreds of other paintings, CDs, novels, and other works of art who were born. They cry out for their loving parents.
title: Picture at an Exhibition
